title: How a gym near Mass. and Cass is helping people stay sober
author: Annie Jonas
bullets: Local News There's no membership of fee.
The only requirement is 48 hours of sobriety, on an honor system.
Eric Henderson chills out at the Phoenix Gym and Community Center in Boston.

title: Feds: ‘Nihilistic Violent Extremist’ threatened to murder minor in Mass.
author: Madison Lucchesi
bullets: Crime Joseph Pacheco, 23, of Everett, Washington, was also charged for allegedly distributing child pornography and animal crushing videos.
A Washington state man, who allegedly shares goals with Nihilistic Violent Extremists, has been charged with threatening to kill a minor in Massachusetts, among other charges.

Joseph Pacheco, 23, of Everett, Washington, was charged with five counts of transmitting threatening communications in interstate commerce and one count each of knowingly distributing child pornography to a minor and possession and distribution of animal crushing videos, according to the U.

title: Chicago man charged with posing as teen, sexually exploiting Brookline girl
author: Madison Lucchesi
bullets: Crime Joshua Rogers, 30, was charged with one count of sexual exploitation of children.
A Chicago man has been charged after allegedly posing as a 17-year-old boy and sexually exploiting a Brookline teen.
Joshua Rogers, 30, was arrested in Chicago on Wednesday morning and is charged with one count of sexual exploitation of children, according to the U.

title: The most famous celebrity voices in Ken Burns’ ‘American Revolution’

title: Ex-Celtics center Luke Kornet makes game-saving block during Spurs-Magic
author: Khari A. Thompson
bullets: Boston Celtics Kornet, who is averaging a career-high 24.
9 minutes for the Spurs, appears to be having fun in San Antonio.
Luke Kornet AP Photo/John Raoux If Wednesday night was any indication, former Celtics big man Luke Kornet appears to be having fun in San Antonio.

title: Scientists amazed after right whale swims here from Ireland
author: Ross Cristantiello
bullets: Local News This is the first time that a North Atlantic right whale initially spotted in European waters has been documented near North America.
A right whale photographed off Boston on Nov.
19, 2025, previously located in Donegal Bay, Ireland, in July 2024.

title: POST commission suspends license of trooper accused of assaulting child
author: Abby Patkin
bullets: Local News State Police relieved Michael Gagnon of duty after he was arrested last week on child abuse allegations.
A Massachusetts State Police trooper casts a shadow on a backdrop during a press conference.

Jessica Rinaldi/The Boston Globe, File By Abby Patkin December 4, 2025 | 11:59 AM 1 minute to read The state’s police oversight commission has suspended a Massachusetts State Police trooper who was arrested last week on child abuse allegations.

title: Jayson Tatum describes relationship with Jaylen Brown, Finals MVP feelings
author: Aidan Buchanan
bullets: Boston Celtics "I was just so excited in that moment that we won a championship.

" Jayson Tatum celebrates winning the 2024 NBA Championship (Kayla Bartkowski/Boston Globe).
